computer_extension_attribute.name: Bootstrap
computer_extension_attribute.description: Reports if the bootstrap token is escrowed to the Jamf Pro Server.

input_type.script:
#!/bin/bash
bootstrap=$(profiles status -type bootstraptoken)
if [[ $bootstrap == *"escrowed to server: YES"* ]]; then echo "YES, Bootstrap escrowed" result="YES"
else echo "NO, Bootstrap not escrowed" result="NO"
fi
echo "<result>$result</result>"
